cultural-tour.title: Cultural Tour
cultural-tour.tagline: Immerse yourself in Bhutan's rich cultural heritage
cultural-tour.description: Experience the spiritual heart of Bhutan through its ancient monasteries, vibrant festivals, and deeply rooted Buddhist traditions. This carefully crafted journey takes you through the kingdom's most sacred sites while connecting you with local communities and their timeless way of life.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available.

highlights: Attend a traditional Bhutanese blessing ceremony
Experience local village life and homestay
Witness sacred mask dances and cultural performances
Hike through pristine pine forests to remote temples

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and transfer to your hotel. Evening orientation and welcome dinner with traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Paro Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Paro Dzong, one of Bhutan's most impressive fortresses, and explore the National Museum. Afternoon visit to Kyichu Lhakhang, one of the oldest temples in Bhutan.

itinerary.title: Tiger's Nest Monastery Hike
itinerary.description: Embark on the iconic hike to Taktsang Monastery (Tiger's Nest), perched on a cliff 900m above the valley. This spiritual journey takes 4-5 hours round trip with breathtaking views.

itinerary.title: Paro to Thimphu
itinerary.description: Drive to Thimphu, Bhutan's capital. Visit the Memorial Chorten, Buddha Dordenma statue, and explore the weekend market if traveling Friday-Sunday.

itinerary.title: Thimphu Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: Deep dive into Bhutanese culture with visits to traditional arts and crafts schools, papermaking factory, and textile museums. Evening cultural show with mask dances.

itinerary.title: Village Homestay Experience
itinerary.description: Travel to a traditional Bhutanese village for an authentic homestay experience. Participate in daily activities, learn to cook local dishes, and connect with your host family.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure flight, carrying memories of Bhutan's rich cultural heritage.

bookingInfo.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 30 days before departure
bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Moderate fitness required for hiking activities

mountain-biking.title: Mountain Biking Tour
mountain-biking.tagline: Adventure through Bhutan's scenic mountain trails
mountain-biking.description: Pedal through pristine mountain landscapes and traditional villages on this thrilling mountain biking adventure. Suitable for all skill levels, this tour combines physical challenge with cultural immersion.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Bike and gear included.

highlights: Visit remote villages accessible only by trail
Explore ancient temples along the route
Quality mountain bikes and safety gear provided

itinerary.title: Arrival and Bike Fitting
itinerary.description: Arrive in Paro, bike fitting and orientation. Short test ride around the valley.

itinerary.title: Paro Valley Ride
itinerary.description: Warm-up ride through Paro valley with stops at cultural sites. Distance: 25km.

itinerary.title: Paro to Thimphu Ride
itinerary.description: Challenging ride over Chele La Pass to Thimphu. Distance: 45km.

itinerary.title: Thimphu Exploration
itinerary.description: Rest day with optional city rides and cultural sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Punakha Valley Ride
itinerary.description: Scenic downhill ride to Punakha with river views. Distance: 35km.

itinerary.title: Village Trail Ride
itinerary.description: Off-road trails through traditional villages. Distance: 30km.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer back to Paro airport for departure.

bookingInfo.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 30 days before

relaxation-tour.title: Relaxation & Wellness Tour
relaxation-tour.tagline: Rejuvenate your mind, body and spirit
relaxation-tour.description: Unwind in Bhutan's tranquil environment with yoga, meditation, spa treatments, and gentle nature walks. Perfect for those seeking peace and renewal.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Spa treatments included.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Welcome
itinerary.description: Arrive in Paro, transfer to wellness resort. Welcome tea and orientation.

itinerary.title: Wellness Program Begins
itinerary.description: Morning yoga, spa consultation, afternoon meditation, evening hot stone bath.

itinerary.title: Mindfulness Day
itinerary.description: Guided meditation, mindfulness walk in nature, spa treatment, healthy cooking class.

itinerary.title: Cultural Wellness
itinerary.description: Visit peaceful temples, blessing ceremony, traditional medicine consultation.

itinerary.title: Nature Immersion
itinerary.description: Gentle forest walk, riverside meditation, herbal spa treatment.

itinerary.title: Deep Relaxation
itinerary.description: Full day of spa treatments, yoga nidra, silent reflection time.

itinerary.title: Thimphu Wellness
itinerary.description: Transfer to Thimphu wellness center, traditional massage, meditation.

itinerary.title: Integration Day
itinerary.description: Morning yoga, create personal wellness plan, farewell ceremony.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning meditation, transfer to airport with renewed spirit.

bookingInfo.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 30 days before
